headline: Hormel Foods Announces 2025 Class of Hormel Heroes Scholarship Recipients
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE: HRL), a Fortune 500 global branded food company, today announced the recipients of this year's $10,000 Hormel Heroes Scholarships. Administered by the National Restaurant Association Educational Foundation (NRAEF), the Hormel Heroes Scholarship program supports students with military backgrounds who are pursuing post-secondary degree in the restaurant, foodservice and hospitality industry.

content.title: Hormel Foods Announces 2025 Class of Hormel Heroes Scholarship Recipients
content.summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE: HRL), a Fortune 500 global branded food company, today announced the recipients of this year's $10,000 Hormel Heroes Scholarships. Administered by the National Restaurant Association Educational Foundation (NRAEF), the Hormel Heroes Scholarship program supports students with military backgrounds who are pursuing post-secondary degree in the restaurant, foodservice and hospitality industry.

thumbnail.caption: Jazmen Wilkerson, a retired and disabled Culinary Specialist First Class who served 11 years in the U.S. Navy, is currently a senior at Morgan State University studying hospitality management.
